name: Grim EVO
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en:
GRIM is a very special token and a labor of love for the community. GRIM enables users to effectively become a shareholder in the Grim Finance platform and receive a distribution equal to 50% of our platform harvest fee. Allowing users to earn rewards that grow directly along side us with our TVL.
GRIM is designed to be deflationary, offering a competitive variable passive burn rate fee of (currently) 1%, and a 1% fee used to form GRIM-FTM. This allows users to gain value from passively holding the token.
